messages.subject: New to the Group
messages.msgSnippet: Hi we are new to this group just actually happened across the site by searching out today for extra info to add to our new coop group. Im actually glad I
messages.messageBody:
Hi we are new to this group just actually happened across the site
by searching out today for extra info to add to our new coop group.
Im actually glad I happened across this group. ANyway to introduce
myself and my family. I am Becca married for 13 years (today
actually) to wounderful husband Glen. We live in Kansas dont know
that it is my favorite place to live in my lifetime but for
homeschooling regulations its one of the best states I feel where we
have our freedom to teach our kids how we feel is necessary and
needed for thier learning styles. We have 5 children and 1 on the
way. 2 boys and 3 girls. 12, 8 are the boys and 9, 6, and 4 are
the girls. This baby is to be a boy due the end of Sept. We just
started an unschooling coop group here due to the fact that a lot of
homeschooled moms dont understand what we are all about its
interesting to see their mouths drop and things come out with YOU
CANT DO THAT THAT WAY........ A lot of people just don't
understand. Its not a well known thing around this area although
traditional homeschooling is.... Does anyone have any ideas on how
to get a conference going in the area we live in....

Im glad to be a part of this group and cant wait to get to know you
all...

Becca
